H0.text: Which car manufacturer has its headquarters at Martorell near Barcelona. Ford

H1.text: Which car manufacturer has its headquarters at Martorell near Barcelona. Renault

H2.text: Which car manufacturer has its headquarters at Martorell near Barcelona. Volkswagen

H3.text: Which car manufacturer has its headquarters at Martorell near Barcelona. SEAT

A4.text: Martorell is home to the SEAT corporate headquarters and automobile factory, where the SEAT Ibiza, Leon, Arona and Audi A1 are manufactured.
